title: chronicles
description: An app to archive the author’s Twitter account after the demise of the bird site.

title: reading
description: A website to track the author’s recent reading. What a joy it is to find oneself lost in a book.

title: wander.online
description: A text-based role-playing game in which the player builds the world they face.

title: strange.website
description: A collection of bizarre and horrifying websites — digital denizens from realms beyond!

title: stillness.digital
description: A soft and quiet blog for sharing moments of slow exhalation.

title: personalsit.es
description: A simple directory of folks’ personal sites; a salute to the art.

title: peaks
description: A log of which 14,000' soaring blue peaks of Colorado the author has summited.

title: soon
description: The author’s personal site and portfolio. Soon you will have only a memory of this moment.

title: compendium.dev
description: An omnibus HTML file to test CSS cascade and formatting with. A quite useful tool, should you need it.

title: sex-work-exclusive-companies.tech
description: An open-source list of tech companies with Terms of Service that discriminate against sex workers.

title: vogue
description: A previous iteration of the author’s personal site and portfolio, circa ✷FW19.

title: super
description: An Alfred extension that allows quick conversion of text to superscript Unicode.
